mapper.select:
SELECT aa.* FROM( SELECT b.cdSeq, b.cdName, b.cdUseNy, b.cdOrder, b.cdDesc, b.cdDelNy, b.cdDateTimeReg, b.cdDateTimeEdit, b.codeGroup_cgSeq, a.cgName, a.cgSeq
ORDER BY b.cdSeq DESC ) aa limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}
SELECT a.cgSeq as codeGroup_cgSeq, a.cgName FROM codegroup a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.cgDelNy = 0 ORDER BY a.cgOrder DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO code( cdName, cdUseNy, cdOrder, cdDesc, cdDelNy, cdDateTimeReg, cdDateTimeEdit, codeGroup_cgSeq )VALUES( #{cdName}, #{cdUseNy}, #{cdOrder}, #{cdDesc}, 0, now(), now(), #{codeGroup_cgSeq} )
mapper.select: SELECT b.cdSeq, b.cdName, b.cdUseNy, b.cdOrder, b.cdDesc, b.cdDelNy, b.cdDateTimeReg, b.cdDateTimeEdit, b.codeGroup_cgSeq FROM pathy.code b WHERE 1 = 1 AND b.cdSeq = #{cdSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE pathy.code SET cdName = #{cdName}, cdUseNy = #{cdUseNy}, cdOrder = #{cdOrder}, cdDesc = #{cdDesc}, cdDelNy = 0, cdDateTimeEdit = now(), codeGroup_cgSeq = #{codeGroup_cgSeq} WHERE 1 = 1 AND cdSeq = #{cdSeq}
UPDATE pathy.code SET cdDelNy = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND cdSeq = #{cdSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT cdSeq, cdName, codeGroup_cgSeq FROM pathy.code WHERE 1=1 AND cdDelNy = 0 AND cdUseNy = 1
